Login.welcome_description: Your AI coach for League of Legends

CoachStatus.title: Coach Status
CoachStatus.active_desc: AMOKK is active and ready to coach you

ConfigurationDialog.assistant_desc: Enable AI assistant to provide real-time advice and analysis during the game
ConfigurationDialog.ptt_desc: Hold the push-to-talk button for 1 second while AMOKK is speaking to interrupt advice
ConfigurationDialog.proactive_desc: AMOKK will proactively identify opportunities and mistakes without waiting for you to ask

PricingDialog.dialog_desc: Unlock Amokk's full potential with a premium plan
PricingDialog.tryhard_desc: Everything you need to grind and progress quickly!
PricingDialog.rush_desc: For those who want to enjoy Amokk every game!

ProgressDialog.card_desc: Discover how Amokk transforms your game
ProgressDialog.dialog_desc: Your ultimate companion to dominate League of Legends
ProgressDialog.why_text: Amokk was created to transform the way you learn League of Legends. We know mastering this game can seem overwhelming, with so many champions, mechanics, and strategies to learn. That's why we developed a personal AI coach that guides you in real-time, turning every game into a learning opportunity.
ProgressDialog.what_title: What Amokk allows you to master
ProgressDialog.feature1_desc: Understand the strengths, weaknesses, and abilities of each champion to anticipate enemy actions
ProgressDialog.feature2_desc: Learn how to handle each matchup, when to be aggressive and when to play safely
ProgressDialog.feature3_desc: Receive advice on positioning, timing, and macro strategies to improve your impact
ProgressDialog.feature4_desc: Identify and correct your errors instantly to progress faster
ProgressDialog.cta_text:
Every game with Amokk is an opportunity to get better.
Enable coaching and start your climb!

QuickStartGuide.title: Quick Start Guide
QuickStartGuide.step_b_desc: Toggle the switch above to enable coaching
QuickStartGuide.step_c_desc: Simply start playing - AMOKK will be there during your games
QuickStartGuide.step_d_desc: Hold push-to-talk for 1 second while AMOKK is speaking to interrupt

RemainingGamesCard.games_remaining_desc: Unlock unlimited coaching with a premium plan

Troubleshooting.title: A problem?
Troubleshooting.subtitle: Find solutions to common problems
Troubleshooting.solution_1: Ensure League of Legends is running
Troubleshooting.solution_3: Verify AMOKK is set to Active
Troubleshooting.solution_4: Restart the application if problems persist
